You have made a difficult decision. We will support you in that decision until you have resolution.

The Carrington Firm can help you get through tumultuous times by preparing a separation agreement or representing you in a contested or uncontested divorce.

For an initial consultation, e-mail us at help@thecarringtonfirm.com, or call us at 718-513-9843.

The sooner you call, the sooner you'll have your peace of mind back.
